name: The Last Moment
description: There are two types of enemies. You Don't have to kill them. You just have to kill the bad ones. Remember, the Bad ones are the Good ones and the Good ones are the Bad ones. Hold "G" To See bad or good enemies. If you kill the Enemies, those are behaving like  the good ones, your health would loss. Good enemies fire bullets but you doesn't take any damage. The Butterflies and Flowers Behaviors can be changed. They can act as good and bad objects. "Find The Way to Go to the BIG House. "If you Kill 5 good enemies You Will DIE!
